name: MainCloud
tag_list: cloud, storage, publishing, photos, videos, documents, music, news, tweets, notes, widgets
overview:
MainCloud is a web based content management and publishing system that lets users bring their world online, access it from anywhere, and share it with anyone.

MainCloud combines the power of cloud storage, with the ease of a personal homepage, and the reach of a publishing system. Users can store, organize and publish photos, videos, documents, music, news feeds, tweets, notes, widgets, websites, searches, favorite clips and friends. Content items are automatically added to pages that can be published or kept private. Published pages can be public or password protected. MainCloud is a free system and allows users to store as much information, and create & publish as many pages as they like. MainCloud supports Flash and HTML5 allowing content to be experienced on any platform, including the iPad and iPhone.
